This directory contains a subset of functions from the BrainStorm software, that are used in FieldTrip. Note that the
directory layout does not follow the exact layout of the brainstorm toolbox. 

See https://neuroimage.usc.edu/brainstorm/ and https://github.com/brainstorm-tools for details and contact information. 

BrainStorm is released under the GPLv3, see LICENSE.txt for details.

Comments:
20211213: JM replaced process_fooof.m with the latest version on BrainStorm github repo
